arts.ttl: Michael Ballack criticises Leroy Sané after performance against Benfica
arts.sum: Michael Ballack, in the televised German broadcast of the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup, spoke about Leroy Sané's impact following Bayern's 0-1 defeat to Portuguese side Benfica.

arts.ttl: Anatoliy Trubin speaks after Benfica defeats Bayern to top Group C
arts.sum: Benfica goalkeeper Anatoliy Trubin spoke to the media after receiving the player of the match award against FC Bayern München at the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: Club World Cup Daily: Angel Di Maria turns back clock as Benfica upset Bayern
arts.sum: Benfica defeated Bayern to win Group C and advance to the knockout round. Here's what you need to know from Tuesday's Club World Cup action.

arts.ttl: Benfica pull off upset of Bayern to win Group C
arts.sum: Benfica's Andreas Schjelderup struck in the first half to seal a 1-0 win over Bayern Munich in sweltering heat on Tuesday, sending the Portuguese side to the top of Group C at the Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: Benfica edge out Bayern as Chelsea learn potential last-16 opponents
arts.sum: Andreas Schjelderup scores the decisive goal to guide Benfica to a narrow 1-0 victory over Bayern Munich at the Club World Cup, setting up a potential knockout round meeting with Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Club World Cup: Auckland City hold on for shock draw with Boca Juniors while Benfica top Bayern
arts.sum: Amateur New Zealand side lost 10-0 to open tournament Bayern already assured of spot in knockout round Boca Juniors were held to a 1-1 draw by Auckland City and failed to reach the knockout stage of the Club World Cup on Tuesday in steamy Nashville, Tennessee, where the match was suspended for nearly 50 minutes due to stormy weather. Boca came into the game needing both a convincing win against already-eliminated Auckland City to overturn a seven-goal difference with Benfica and for the Portuguese club to lose to German champions Bayern Munich in the other Group C fixture. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Benfica vs Bayern Munich live: Club World Cup team news, line-ups and more tonight
arts.sum: The European clubs will battle to finish top of Group C with Benfica at risk of elimination if they lose

arts.ttl: Benfica vs. Bayern Munich: FIFA Club World Cup probable teams, match stats & LIVE blog!
arts.sum: Already qualified for the knockout phase of the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup, Bayern Munich can clinch first place in Group C should they avoid defeat against Benfica in Charlotte, North Carolina on Tuesday (kick-off: 3pm EDT/ 9pm CEST). Previous wins against Auckland City and Boca Juniors ensured Bayern's competition would extend into the last 16, and one more positive result in the group decider against Benfica would guarantee the Bundesliga champions top spot in the section.

Benfica claimed their first win of the Club World Cup with a resounding 6-0 win over Group C whipping boys Auckland City to leave them on four points from the opening two matches. Bayern Munich made ...

arts.ttl: Will Muller play? How Bayern could line up on Tuesday against Benfica
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how Bayern Munich could line up for their Club World Cup clash against Benfica on Tuesday.
